contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox airport | name = Qualicum Beach Airport | image = Qualicum_beach_airport.jpg | IATA = XQU | ICAO = | TC = CAT4 | type = Public | owner = | operator = Town of Qualicum Beach | city-served = | location = [[Qualicum Beach, British Columbia]] | elevation-f = 190 | latd = 49 | latm = 20 | lats = 14 | latNS = N | longd= 124 | longm= 23 | longs= 38 | longEW= W | coordinates_region = CA-BC | pushpin_map = Canada British Columbia | pushpin_label = CAT4 | pushpin_map_caption = Location in British Columbia | website = | r1-number = 11/29 | r1-length-f = 3,564 | r1-surface = [[Asphalt]] | footnotes = Source: [[Canada Flight Supplement]]<ref name="CFS">{{CFS}}</ref> }} '''Qualicum Beach Airport''', {{Airport codes|XQU|||CAT4}}, is located {{convert|1.8|NM|lk=in}} south of [[Qualicum Beach, British Columbia|Qualicum Beach]], [[British Columbia]], [[Canada]]. ==Airlines and destinations== [[File:KD Air GXEY.jpg|thumb|[[KD Air]] [[Piper Navajo]]]] *[[KD Air]] (Texada Island, Vancouver International) <ref>[http://www.kdair.com/ K.D. Air schedules and bookings]</ref> *[[Orca Airways]] (Vancouver International)<ref>[http://www.flyorcaair.com/flight-schedule.php Orca Airways flight schedule]</ref> *[[Qualicum Flight Center]] (Rentals, Training, Charters)<ref>[http://www.qualicumflightcenter.com/ Qualicum Flight Center]</ref> ==References== <references/> ==External links== {{commons category|Qualicum Beach Airport}} *[http://archive.copanational.org/PlacesToFly/airport_view.php?pr_id=3&ap_id=85 Qualicum Beach Airport] on [[Canadian Owners and Pilots Association|COPA's]] ''Places to Fly'' airport directory *{{ASN|XQU|XQU: Qualicum Airport}} {{List of airports in Canada}} [[Category:Certified airports in British Columbia]] [[Category:Regional District of Nanaimo]] {{BritishColumbia-airport-stub}}
